string-array.name: easy_questions
string-array.item: Examine the picture above. What animal do those spots belong to?
What is the name of the green pigment found in most plants that contributes to photosynthesis?
Which of the following are part of the integumentary system?
Which of the following types of cells in the human retina allow you to see color?

string-array.name: easy_options
string-array.item: To taste the air@To cool off@To be funny@Because they are tired
